ALL_DISAPPEARS.description: No diagnosis condition of any severity is persisting.

APPEARS.description: The diagnosis condition indicated arises and/or persists.

DISAPPEARS.description: The diagnosis condition indicated does not longer persist. No diagnosis condition of the same severity is persisting for the affected channel.

DISAPPEARS_OTHER_REMAIN.description: The diagnosis condition indicated does not longer persist. Other diagnosis conditions of the same severity are persisting.

HI_LIM_EXCEEDED.description: Upper limit value exceeded. Only supported by RIOforPA channels.

LO_LIM_EXCEEDED.description: Lower limit value underrun. Only supported by RIOforPA channels.

SIMULATION_ACTIVE.description: Simulation is active. Only supported by RIOforPA channels.

MODE_CHANGED.description: Mode of block has changed. Only supported by RIOforPA channels.

SUBSTITUTE_VALUE_USED.description: Substitute value used. Only supported by RIOforPA channels.

Q_BAD_SUBSTITUTE_VALUE_USED.description: Process Image Qualifier = 0. Substitute value used by (Sub)Module. Only supported by RIOforFA channels.

ALL_DISAPPEARS.description: No diagnosis condition of any severity is persisting.

APPEARS.description: The diagnosis condition indicated arises and/or persists.

DISAPPEARS.description: The diagnosis condition indicated does not longer persist. No diagnosis condition of the same severity is persisting for the affected channel.

DISAPPEARS_OTHER_REMAIN.description: The diagnosis condition indicated does not longer persist. Other diagnosis conditions of the same severity are persisting.

HI_LIM_EXCEEDED.description: Upper limit value exceeded. Only supported by RIOforPA channels.

LO_LIM_EXCEEDED.description: Lower limit value underrun. Only supported by RIOforPA channels.

SIMULATION_ACTIVE.description: Simulation is active. Only supported by RIOforPA channels.

MODE_CHANGED.description: Mode of block has changed. Only supported by RIOforPA channels.

SUBSTITUTE_VALUE_USED.description: Substitute value used. Only supported by RIOforPA channels.

Q_BAD_SUBSTITUTE_VALUE_USED.description: Process Image Qualifier = 0. Substitute value used by (Sub)Module. Only supported by RIOforFA channels.

GOOD.description: For ConsumerStatus: The submodule’s IO data object could be successfully processed by the application process.  For ProviderStatus: The content of the submodule’s IO data object is valid.

BAD_BY_SUBSLOT.description: For ConsumerStatus: not used.  For ProviderStatus: The content of the submodule’s IO data object is invalid. The condition was detected by the submodule.

BAD_BY_SLOT.description: For ConsumerStatus: not used.  For ProviderStatus: . The content of the submodule’s IO data object is invalid. The condition was detected by the module.

BAD_BY_DEVICE.description: For ConsumerStatus: The IO device has locally detected problems to convey data.  For ProviderStatus: The content of the submodule’s IO data object is invalid. The condition was detected by the device.

BAD_BY_CONTROLLER.description: For ConsumerStatus: The submodule’s IO data object could not be successfully processed by the application of the Controller (e.g. because of the operation state “stop”).  For ProviderStatus: The content of the submodule’s IO data object is invalid. The condition was only locally detected by the Controller.

DIGITAL_0_24V.description: Digital, 0/24 V (discrete input or output only)

USE_SUBSTITUTE_VALUE.description: The value of the SubstituteValue configuration property is used as substitute value if an error condition is detected.

USE_LAST_VALID_VALUE.description: The last valid value is used as substitute value if an error condition is detected.

USE_ACTUAL_VALUE.description: No substitute value is used, the process value can have the wrong calculated value and status even if the error condition is detected.

Unspecified.description: No information about the status is given.

SimulationEnabled.description: Value used to set the Value of one SimulationEnabled array element.

Index.description: Index of array element to set. If -1, the SimulationEnabled parameter is assigned to all array elements.

Value.title: RioAnalogDataType
Value.description: Value used to set the Value member of the array element.

Qualifier.description: Value used to set the Qualifier member of the array element.

Index.description: Index of array element to set. If -1, the parameters are assigned to all array elements.

SimulationEnabled.description: Value used to set the Value of one SimulationEnabled array element.

Index.description: Index of array element to set. If -1, the SimulationEnabled parameter is assigned to all array elements.

Value.description: Value used to set the Value member of the array element.

Qualifier.description: Value used to set the Qualifier member of the array element.

Index.description: Index of array element to set. If -1, the parameters are assigned to all array elements.
